mno_enterprise.templates.onboarding.welc: Setting up the Maestrano platform for the first time takes just a few minutes.
Our easy setup guide will take you through the process of connecting your first business applications and offer some insights on how to get the most out of your new cloud platform.
mno_enterprise.templates.onboarding.sele: Select the applications you want to connect
You cannot start with more than 4 apps, you will be able to add more at a later stage.
mno_enterprise.templates.onboarding.data: Visualise what data will be synchronised from your applications by clicking on their icons.
Learn how Maestrano synchronises data between your applications.
mno_enterprise.templates.onboarding.app_:
{name} is an add-on on Maestrano. You either need an existing account or to create an account.
The only thing you need to do is to authorise Maestrano to synchronise data with your account by clicking on "connect my account"
